mapper.select: select ec_name,amount,expense_date,assets_name,memo from expense as e join expense_category as ec on e.ec_id=ec.ec_id join assets as a on e.assets_id=a.assets_id where user_key=#{userKey} and expense_date=#{expenseDate};

select ic_name,amount,assets_name,memo from income as i join income_category as ic on i.ic_id=ic.ic_id join assets as a on i.assets_id=a.assets_id where user_key=#{userKey} and income_date=#{incomeDate};
select sum(amount) as amount from expense where expense_date=#{weekDate} and user_key=#{userKey}
select sum(amount) as amount from income where income_date=#{weekDate} and user_key=#{userKey}
